column1: MRI image size (256, 128, 1) of the head of a man of 37 years old in weighting T2, with axial section. We observe slice n°155 beginning from the base of the skull. The following elements are present : the white matter of left cerebral hemisphere of volume 3980.1270 mm³, the cortex of left cerebral hemisphere of volume 3978.8086 mm³, the white matter of right cerebral hemisphere of volume 3969.5801 mm³ and the cortex of right cerebral hemisphere of volume 4040.7715 mm³.
